Instructions

Board controls

To place a new ship on your board left click a cell. To remove a ship right click it. To change the horientation of a ship click the "horientation" button or Q on you keyboard. After placing all types of ships you can start the game.

board Symbols

  • s = A ship

  • m = Missed shot

  • h = You Hit a ship
